details:
verb
- to express approval of
= example: to express approval of
= synonyms: praise
- to mention as by way of greeting or to indicate friendship
= synonyms: remember
- to express a good opinion of
= synonyms: recommend
- to give to in charge
= example: to give to in charge
- to present as worthy of regard, kindness, or confidence
= example: to present as worthy of regard, kindness, or confidence
